alert.note: Alert for Aiken (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 2:50PM EDT until April 05 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL AIKEN COUNTY... At 249 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Graniteville, or near Clearwater, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. Locations impacted include... Aiken, North Augusta, Clearwater, Aiken Mall, Belvedere, USC Aiken, Citizens Park, Aiken Municipal Airport, Gloverville, Graniteville, Burnettown, Hopeland Gardens and Vaucluse. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 6 and 31. Interstate 520 in South Carolina between mile markers 20 and 23. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection seek shelter inside a sturdy building and stay away from windows.
